de yang bka' 'byed las /
yang rdzong seng ge'i rdzong chen duH. byang chub sgrub cing yod tsa naH. mnga' bdag rgyal po'i bang chen byungH. bsam yas mthil du spyan drangs nasH. dbu rtse bya 'dab lho ngos suH. zab chen seng ris gdan du btingsH. g.yu dmar bya mgo phyag tu phulH. lha phyag byas nas 'di skad gsungsH. zhes pa ltar mnga' bdag dpal 'khor btsan gyis gnubs chen la lcags sdig gi skor rnams zhus na'ang gnam lcags u ra 'dra'i chos skor zhig gtad nas sdig pa'i chos rnams gter du sbas par gsungs pas slob dpon 'di khri srong lde btsan nas bzung dpal 'khro btsan gyi bar du byung ba la brten mkhas pa rnams dpyad gzhi che bar mdzad kyang bka' shog rgya bo cher /
klu mal dro gzi byin gyis /
rig pa rang dbang thob pa'i slob dpon sangs rgyas khyodH. mya ngan ma 'da' sems can don la bzhugsH. zhes zhus pa'i lan du ji tsam bar du sdad pa'i dbang yod kyangH. phyag na rdo rje'i dbang gi bka' mi gcogH. ces dang /
char ka'i thems byang las /
lo grangs brgya dang bcu gnyis lon pa naH. zhes yod pas tshe'i rigs 'dzin la mnga' brnyes pa'i phyir khri srong lde btsan gyi dus nas bzung dpal 'khor btsan gyi par du bzhugs par mngon la /

so / /
! gnubs sangs rgyas ye shes rin po ches bal yul du lan bdun byon pa'i phyi ma la bal po b+ha su d+ha ras mna' bsgags nas rdzogs bar gnang ba'i yang bzlog nag po me'i spu gri phung po ri be che dang lho brag mkho mthing lha khang du gter du sbas pa las phung po ri bo che nas las dang skal bar ldan pa'i sprul sku rgya zhang khrom gyis spyan drangs pa'i skor la /
thog mar ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang chog bdud dpung zil gnon gyi steng nas sta gon dang 'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba'i spyi'i dbang zhes par gshin rje rigs lnga brtul zhugs ngang bcas pas rdo rje slob ma'i dbang bum gsang shes rab ye shes bzhi ba'i dbang mtha' rten dang bcas pas rdo rje slob dpon gyi dbang /
rdzogs rim rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyi smin byed thod rgal rdzogs chen snang ba bzhi'i dbang /
bye brag gi dbang zhes pa sku lha dbang /
snying po sngags dbang /
thugs phyag mtshan gyi dbang /
phyi dur khrod chas kyi dbang /
nang nyan bshad sgom sgrub 'phrin las kyi dbang /
bka' rdzogs mchod rten gyi dbang /
yon tan 'dod yon gyi dbang /
bsgral ba srog ye shes su dbang bskur ba /
sreg zor gtad mnan bcas pas 'phrin las kyi dbang /
khyad par gtor ma'i dbang dang bcas pa chos rgyal 'bri gung pa rin cen phun tshogs kyi ljags bsgrigs kyi steng nas rnon po nad gcod kyi gtor dbang bka' gtad dang bcas pa yid ches par thob /
'di la gzhogs drud nas snang rtse sde pas rnon po nang bcud kyi rjes gnang zhes gcod pa dang bcud kyi khyad par ma shes par go don log par bzung ba'i rang bzo'i dbang chog gsar du brtsams 'dug pa ni shes ldan rnams kyis dug bzhin du spang bar rigs so / /
lung gi skor la yang bzlog me'i spu gri lo rgyus ka? rgyas ba dpal 'bri gung pa chos kyi grags pas mdzad pa /
lo rgyus sngon du 'gro ba'i yang bzlog ('khon?)zur?shrI? me'i spu gri mtshon cha'i gzhung /
bsrung zlog gsad gsum la nang gses kyi sngags dmigs (zur?)shrI? gnyis su phye ba'i yang bzlog me'i spu gri'i zhal gdams shog dril gces pa brgyad dang ldan pa'i man ngag chu dar sngon po la dngul gyi yi ger bris te mchod sgrom smug por shel gyi par bur rgyas btab tshul /
yang bzlog me'i spu gri'i lag len gab pa mngon ('khon?)zur?shrI? du bla ma'i phyag len ltar phyung ba lag len dngos gzhir grags pa /
bsrung zlog gsad gsum gyi dus su ye shes sems dpa'i man ngag gab pa gsal stong (zur?)shrI? sgom pa lha'i gnad kyi zhal gdams /
bca' gzhi rdzas kyi gnad /
dgra bo gsad pa'i gnad /
sgom pa lha'i gnad /
bzlas pa sngags kyi gnad /
drod tshad rtags kyi gnad de zhal gdams gnad lnga mar ('khon?)zur?shrI? grags pa gser srang gang gi bka' rgya can /
gtor ma'i gnad kyi man ngag shin tu gab pa (zur?)shrI? zur tsam bstan la /
'khor lo'i gnad /
lha'i gnad /
sham bu kha bsgyur gyi gnad gsum ston pa zhal gdams shrI? gnad gsum du grags pa'i u pa de sha rgya ston nam mkha' chos kyi rgya mtshos mdzad pa /
des gu ru tsan+d+ras bskul ngor mdzad pa'i spu gri dkar nag gi bca' thabs rab gnas /

mtshan bzhi /
gnad gsum dang ldan pa'i gdams pa shrI? zab mo byang ma stobs 'joms /
des bla ma zla @# / /
pas bskul ba'i ngor mdzad pa'i smyug tshigs dang mnan gsad kyi ling shrI? ga thun rdzas dang bcas pa'i zab gnad zhal gdams byad ma srog len zhes bya ba /
nying zlog la nye bar mkho ba'i dbye (shrI?)q? 'gugs gtor sngags kyi zhal shes zab mo /
rigs 'dzin chos kyi grags pas long po nas rtsad bcad pa'i 'khor lo dang ling ga'i shrI? zhal gdams slob dpon padmas gnubs la gnang ba kun la med pa'i khyad chos sngags pa stong dang 'gras kyang nyal bas chog pa /
long po'i zhal shes kyi 'phros bsrung bzlog gsad gsum gyi sngags kyi sham bu bsgyur shrI? lugs kun la med pa'i man ngag khyad par can rgya gar khrag 'thung nag pos bal po b+ha su d+ha ra la gnang ba'i bla ma byang chub mgon po'i gsung bzhin bris pa /
ling ga thog mar blta ba lugs dang bar du 'ching ba mthar chos longs sprul gsum gyi sgo nas rnam shes sbar ba zer gyi mjug tu bya ba'i man ngag zab mo /
bla 'gugs kyi ting 'dzin dus sngags lha dbye'i (zur?)shrI? zab gnad bskul dang bcas pa rgya'i gter ma /
lha dbye mthing nag gru gsum ma sngags rdzas dang bcas pa /
dus drug gi bla 'gugs kyi bskul /
yang bzlog mkhan po nang 'gras na pu ri'i bca' (zur?)shrI? thabs dang sngags zlog lugs /
'go ba'i lha lnga la brten pa'i bsrung bzlog gsang mnan gyi kha bsgyur zhing (zur?)shrI? tshor ba lnga ldan gyi sgo nas bla 'gugs pa /

rgya gar khrag 'thung nag po gsum gyis gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud dang man ngag rnams kyi nang nas shin tu zab pa 'jam dpal rigs gsum 'dus pa'i bdag nyid yi dam chos skyong dbyer med du sgrub pa gshin rje khro chu dug sdong gi skor rnams slob dpon pa la po'i rgyal po la gnang zhing de yang gzhung las /
mu stegs ston pa 'di nyid kyisH. las sbyor gshin rje'i ngan sngags 'diH. gshin rje nag po'i rgyung nas btusH. lcags kyi par pur bcug nas niH. bal yul 'bum thang gter du sbasH. phyi rabs dus kyi mtha' ma laH. las can gcig ngang phrad par shogH. las can gcig gis thon nas kyangH. gdug pa'i dgra bo sgrol bar shogH. ces smon lam dang bcas te bal yul 'bum thang ge rung gzhung yin sogs gter du spas /
chos skor rnams chig brgyud kyi tshul du gnubs ba na sangs rgyas ye shes la gnang de yang las rab rgya mtshor slob dpon 'di nyid kyis mu stegs rnams 'phung bar mdzad pas mu stegs slob dpon du grags par bshad do / /
der ma zad /
spu ngan sangs rgyas ye shes kyisH. rgya gar gtsug lag dpal dge laH. bal yul yam bu'i dgon du zhusH. bdag 'dra sangs rgyas ye shes kyisH. gshin rje nag po'i zhal gdams sbyarH. gtsug lag dpal dge'i bkar nyan pasH. su la'ang mi spel gter du sbasH. zhes bal po'i rgyal por ma zad gtsug lag dpal dge la yang gsan zhing slob dpon rnam gnyis las byung ba'i shog dril zhal gdams kyi skor rnams gnubs kyis mon yul 'bum thang ke rung bse sgrom smug po dang byang spra dun rtser yang shog dril 'ga' zhig sbas pa'i bal mon sogs kyi gter kha sprul pa'i gter ston rgya zhang khrom gyis spyan drangs pa'i chog skor la /

gsang ba'i man ngag bdag gi khong snying 'diH. rgya yi dpe las bod kyi yi ger bsgyurH. bstan zhing bshad pa'i rje blon gnyis pa yangH. dam tshig gzhung dang ldan zhing dang ldan yangH. snying gi man ngag mchog 'di blos mthongsH. bstan pa'i btsas su sa yi gter du sbasH. 'dis rtags rnams gsal bar bstan /
rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po sh+lo ka 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi pa las khyad par du bkod pa rin po che 'byung bar byed pa sgra thal 'gyur chen po chos rnams kun gyi rtsa bar bstan pa'i rgyud le'u drug gis sde snod kun gyi rtsa ba ston /

rdo rje sems dpa' snying gi me long zhes bya ba yang gsang gab sbas pa'i rgyud rdzogs pa chen po gtan la 'bebs pa gzhon nu dpa' bo stobs ldan gyis dur khrod me ri 'bar bar gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs pa rnams la rang rang gi don dngos su bstan pa bka' dam pa gsang ba'i rgyud chen le'u brgyad pa mchims phu brag dmar dge gong gi tshal du slob dpon byi mA las sgra mi mthun pa gsum las bsgyur ba ska cog gnyis kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa nyang gis zha'i mgon po gri thod can la gnyer du gtad nas gter du sbas /

rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi las phyung ba mu tig rin po che'i 'phreng ba'i rgyud le'u brgyad kyis man ngag tha dad pa'i thabs kyis grol bar ston /

rdzogs pa chen po 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bcud phyung ba las gser gyi me tog mdzes pa'i rin po che sgron ma 'bar ba'i rgyud le'u bzhis sgron ma bzhi ston /

kun tu bzang pos 'og min gyi gnas su 'khor rnams la rig pa'i thabs bstan pa gsang sngags kun gyi rtsa ba'i don ma nor bar ston pa'i rgyud ye shes lag phrad du bstan pa dbang bzhi yongs rdzogs su bstan pa'i rgyud seng ge rtsal rdzogs chen po le'u bcu gsum gyis lta ba phyogs ris med par ston /
nor bu phra bkod rang gi don thams cad gsal bar byed pa'i rgyud le'u bcu bzhis lam srol du 'dzud par ston /
bka' srung khros ma nag mo gsang ba snying gi rgyud dpal ldan rang byung rgyal mos gsungs pa le'u sum cu so gcig /
khros nag gis tshangs pa gdong bzhi par sprul nas gsungs pa'i rgyud le'u zhe gcig /

gsang mchog dam pa gzhan du ma bstan pa'iH. snying las lhag pa'i man ngag snying thig laH. kha byang rnams su bkod par ma phod pa'iH. rtsa rnams mdud pa snying la 'dus pa ltarH. brgya dang bcu dgu man ngag dam pa rnamsH. yang gsang snying dang 'dra ba bzhi la 'dusH. zhes rgya che ba'i chos kyi snying po mtha' dag zab pa pod bzhir 'dus par bstan /
pod bzhi'i rgyu mtshan yang sgron ma rang gsal las /
snying po nges pa'i rang bzhin 'di lta buH. phyis kyang 'byung ba shin tu dkon pa'oH. de yi don gyi tshad ni 'di lta buH. gzhan gyis bsgyur zhing bshig par dka' ba'i phyirH. shog tshad snod kyi bye brag 'di lta steH. zhes byang bu'i rgyu dang tshad yi ge sogs gsungs pa ltar /

sgron ma rang gsal las /
rin cen lnga yi rang byung byang bu niH. sus kyang byas shing bzo yis ma bsgrubs paH. 'byung ba'i dgra dang bral ba'i byang bu niH. bzhi bcu brgyad de sus kyang bshig tu medH. rang byung ye gi skad kyi rigs ltar snangH. rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ba brangs kyis mi lang ba'iH. byin rlabs nyed la rang snang nyid du sharH. rin cen shel gyi glegs shing bar du stemH. rnam bdun rin cen gzer chen bzhi yis bsdamsH. zhes yi ge yang gdul bya so so'i snang ngor de dang de'i yi ger 'char bar gsungs pa dang /
gsan yig rnying pa la lar gser yig can la btags grol gyi tha snyad gzhag rung ba lta bu byung yang de ltar ma grags zhes pa ltar na dpyad dgos par snang ngo / /
gnyis pa 'das rjes kyi skor ni /
sgron ma rang gsal las /
rin cen mthing sngon byang bu bcu drug laH. rin cen gser gyi yi ges spras pa steH. zangs kyi dra ba'i nang du bcug pa niH. 'das rjes gsum po nyid de rab tu bsangH. zhes pa ltar sangs rgyas kyi 'das rjes gsum gyi dang po e e e ma regs kyi bu zhes sogs dga' ldan nas 'tsho byed gzhon nu'i ldum rar babs pa man ngag rnams kyi rtsa ba dga' rab rdo rjes rtogs pa'i gdeng rnyed ngo zhes pa mthar tshang ba /
de'i 'grel ba'i tshul du zhal chems gnyis pa e ma ho rigs kyi bu zhes sogs gsang chen rol ba'i dur khrod du babs pa mkha' 'gro mas gnas su snang bar byas so mthar tshang ba /
de'i 'grel TIka gi tshul du zhal chems gsum pa zag pa rang zad ces sogs bya rgod phud rir babs pa dngos grub kun gyi rtsa bar 'byung mthar tshang ba /
thems med skor la de dang 'dra min sangs rgyas kyi zhal chems dang po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drug pa rdo rje 'chang zhes sogs dga' rab rdo rje rtogs pa gdeng dang ldan par gyur tas mthar tshang ba /
'di gsan yig gzhan na med pa'ang 'dug pa dpyad /
'das rjes gnyis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i stobs zhes sogs bstan pa thams cad kyi bcud bsdus shing bu gcig par bstan pa'o mthar tshang ba /
'das rjes gsum pa rang gsal rdo rje 'chang zhes sogs bstan pa thams cad kyi bu gcig par bkod pa'os mthar tshang ba /
sangs rgyas kyi 'das rjes gsum po kha byang rab tu snang byed du brgya bcu dgu li chang tshan du bshad kyang ba byang nyi rgyan na thab pa bod bzhi'i gras su gsungs shing grub mtha' mdzod kyi kha byang rang yang mthun no / /

gi mthar tshang ba /

ra gan glebs pa'i phyang bu drug cu laH. dmar po zangs zhun yi ger btab pa niH. rin cen mchong gi glegs shing bar du stemH. rin cen lnga yi gzer chen gnyis kyis bsdamsH. bse yi sgrom bu khong nag nang du stsalH. gsang ba'i man ngag zangs yig can de niH. rab tu gsang bas rnal 'byor don rab 'grubH. ces pa'i skor la thems byang las /

mdo byang las /
sgra dang tha snyad bkod pa chen po lasH. snying po 'di ni yongs su bsdus pa'oH. shin tu dkon pas sngon po'i g.yu yis brisH. gzhan dang thun mong dag tu ma byas laH. kha byang las /

dang po ni /
bkod pa chen po dum bu'i rgyud las rmongs pa'i gdung sel lo rgyus bstan par zhus don bcu gnyis kyi nang gses brgyud pa gsum pa'am dus gsum sangs rgyas dgongs bas brgyud pa'i chag don zhes ba ston pa'i byon tshul zhus don dang po /

dz+nyA na su tra drin can gyisH. bi mA la mi tra bdag la gtadH. bod du gdan drangs snying la bcangsH. bstan pa'i gnas med sems la rnagsH. rgya nag 'gro kham bangs kyi ga'u ruH. bcug ste sgrags kyi yang rdzong ngag tu sbasH. las can zhig gis rnyed par shogH. ces rdzogs chen thugs kyi snying bo bstan pa'i rgyun la brten nas nyams len mdo don du bsgril pa mkhas pa shrI sid+has slob dpon ye shes mdo la gsungs /

lo rgyus las /
kun bzang dgongs pa'i bcud dril ba'iH. rigs 'dzin lhag rnog pa'i chosH. bim mi tra thugs kyi gterH. yang rdzong dag na yod pa yiH. gter yig ston pa dbang yis kyisH. bdag la byin te las 'phro sangH. ces pa ltar ston pa dbang phyug ye shes kyis kha byang gtad pa la brten nas grub thob me long rdo rjes 'brug lo dgun zla 'bring po'i gnam stong la spyan drangs pa'i rdzogs pa chen po gnas la btags pa yang rdzang snying tig gter ston la btags pa me long snying tig sku gsung thugs kyi rkyal btags pa AH. hUM ma glegs bam gyi tshad la btags pa bi mA la'i gong khug mar grags pa'i dbang lung nos pa la rmi lam rdzun gyi yang zhun steng nas pad 'dab bzhi ba sgo bzhi'i dbyibs 'ja' ris can gyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas skyabs sems /

lnga brgya snyigs ma rtsod ldan dusH. g.yas du stod yul zang zang mtharH. ri rgyal rin cen spungs 'dra yodH. de yi shar mgul nang 'dabs suH. pha ni brtul zhugs bzang spyod rigsH. ma ni mkha' 'gro dbang phyug maH. rdo rje gzhon nu yab yum gyiH. ting 'dzin ngang du sbyor ba lasH. las dang thugs rje'i smon lam 'dzomH. rigs ldan gsang sngags zab mo'i chosH. skye ba gsum du bsgrubs pa'i mtharH. rdo rje phag mo'i thugs kyi srasH. khro gtum rig pa'i ye shes rgyasH. padma 'byung gnas gsung gi srasH. nga yi gsung la the tshom medH. rdo rje bdung 'joms sku yi srasH. khro bo'i cha byang gzi brjid cheH. grub thob rgyal po lung bstan canH. gnas der skye ba'i tshul bstan nasH. lus kyi spyod pa ma nges teH. ngag tu mi rtag chos 'chad 'gyurH. yid la yang dag snying po bsgrubH. nyi shu rtsa lnga lon pa'i tsheH. ya mtshan rtags dang dngos grub mthongH. byang phyogs gnyan yul zang zang nasH. gsang sngags bstan pa'i sgo rnyed 'gyurH. chos sgo lnga brgya phrag gcig 'donH. zhes dang /
sprul sku ayon gling pa'i lung bstan las /
sku sprul nyi ma 'od zer yinH. gsung sprul chos kyi dbang phyug yinH. thugs sprul rgod kyi ldem phra yinH. yon tan ayon gling ba yinH. 'phrin las che brtan rgyal mtshan yinH. 'di lnga padma 'byung gnas dngosH. zhes zhang snan nam rdo rje bdud 'joms kyi sprul pa'i zlos gar rigs 'dzin chen po rgod kyi ldem phru can zhes pa ri rgyal bkra bzang gi shar 'dabs su sbas pa'i rnal 'byor gyi tshul du byon te zab gter spyan drangs pa ni /
mdzod gsum @# / /
gyi lung bstan las /
byang ri bo bkra bzang zhes bya'i rtse la rdo rje'i rigs kyi mkha' 'gro mas gtad pa'i gter gyi lde mig yodH. des bton pa'i gter thams cad bod la bstan pa yun bsring ba'i gter byin te 'gro don du spyad par bya'oH. zhes ri bo bkra bzang nas gter gyi lde mig dang gter phran 'ga' zhig bzhes shing gter chen ni lung bstan kun gsal sgron ma las /
lha sras gdung brgyud gung thang 'dzin pa'i dusH. ri bo bkra bzang zhes bya'i shar 'dabs suH. sbas pa'i rnal 'byor rgod kyi ldem phru canH. brtul zhugs spyod pa'i rnal 'byor dam pa yisH. lha sras gdung brgyud skyob pa'i chos skal rnamsH. zang zang lha brag brag la sbas pa lenH. zhes pa ltar byang phyogs gnyan ri zang zang lha brag nas bod kyi blon po lta bu'i gter dpal ayon chen pos bod khams sems can gyi sdug bsngal skyob pa'i phyir du sku gsung thugs kyi tshab tu mdzod lnga bzhag pa byang gter zhes nyi zla ltar grags pa spyan drangs pa yin la /

! zlog byed gyad? kyi 'khor lo'i rgyus las /
phyi yi 'chi bdag gshin rje deH. gyad kyi man ngag 'di yis bzlogH. nang gi dbang po srog gi rtenH. bcud len rdzas dang sman gyis gsoH. gsang ba tshe yi dngags ma deH. bskyed rim dbang dang rlung gis gsoH. de tshe bag chags dag par 'gyurH. zhes pa'i zab tshes sprul sku rigs 'dzin chen bos dbus snying mdzod smug bo nas gdan drangs pa'i mngon po tshe dpag med nang longs spyod rdzogs sku'i chos skor la /
ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du gter gzhung gi sgrub thabs padma'i 'phreng ba dang 'phrin las gnyis gter ston gyis bsdebs pa'i chog bsgrigs kyi steng nas smin byed dbang dang /
snyan brgyud 'chi med 'od snang gi steng nas phyi lus kyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas tshe bsring ba /

! rigs 'dzin rtsa ba'i sgrub ba las /
lho phyogs gser mdzod ser po naH. bla ma dpal chen he ru kaH. rgyal po'i tshul du sgrub pa yodH. ces dang /
sku gsung thugs kyi gnang 'dus las /
lha yi bye brag rang bzhin bsam yas kyangH. lha yi ngo bo rdo rje slob dpon yinH. 'di la lha tshogs gang yang ma 'dus medH. sngags kyi bye brag rang bzhin bsam yas kyangH. sngags kyi snying po yi ge hUM la 'dusH. bde gshegs snying po ma 'dus gang yang medH. thugs kyi dgongs pa brjod bral bsam yas kyangH. kun bzang dgongs pa stong gsal 'dzin med maH. tshes nyid 'od gsal gang la'ang bsam du medH. ces pa ltar gsang ba las kyang ches gsang zhing zab pa las kyang ches zab ba'i man ngag sprul sku rigs 'dzin chen pos phal cher lho gser mdzod ser po nas sbyan drangs pa'i bla ma rigs 'dzin thugs sgrub drag @# / /
po rtsal gyi chos skor la /
thog mar ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug cing dbang bskur ba sta gon dang bcas pa'i yi ge'i steng nas sta gon gyi rim pa sngon du 'gro ba'i che ba sgrub chen brgyad kyi rtsa ba dril ba drag po rtsal gyi dbang chog chen mo'i las byang rgyas 'bring gang rung gzhung bsrangs pa'i mngon rtogs dbang chog so so'i dbun long ba ltar mdzad /
steng nas bum dbang /

las kyi bya khyung nag po'i gtor dbang rnams mnos shing /
yang tig gces pa'i sgron me rigs 'dzin brgyud pa'i gsung rgyun gyis brgyan nas nyams 'khrid lus lha'i dkyil 'khor dang ngag sngags kyi dkyil 'khor phyi dmigs rim sngon du 'gro ba'i sgo nas sems chos nyid kyi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i gnas lugs gtan la phab ste ka dag gcer mthong du ngo sprad /

'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtse /

dang thems med gnyis 'khrugs bsdabs su snang ba rtogs sla bar mngon zhing /
de dag la mthun mi mthun nyi rigs 'dug na'ang zhib mor dpyad cing che 'bring gi dbye ba yang 'jam dbyangs mkhyen brtses tshar chen dang bkra bzang chos skyong bsod nams gnyis la gsan tho dang /
rigs 'dzin chen po'i gsan yig /
tshes rgyal mang+ga'i mtshan can gyi gsan yig rnams su mthun mi mthun ci rigs byung ba blo mig chung dus legs par brtags te bkod pa la /
thugs sgrub (byang? kyi thems )se? byang /
'bring /
de las /
dang po sngon byung gleng gzhi'i khungsH. gsal bar bya phyir lo rgyus yodH. ces pa'i thems can bu tshal gser khang gling du bdud blon rnams btul tshul dang chos rgyal gyi man la lam du ngo mtshar ba'i bkod pa bstan pa sogs kyi gtam rgyud thugs sgrub rnam gsum gyi lo rgyus (yol?)se? su grags pa /
'bring thems med la /
thugs sgrub rtsa ba brgyud pa'i lo @# / /
rgyus rdo rje phur pa he ru ka las kyi rgyal po thugs kyi sgrub thabs zhes pa bla ma phur pa dbyer med kyi lo rgyus karma mA le 'phrin las kyi rgyud dam (yol?)me? gsang ba rin cen 'dus pa'i lo rgyus su grags pa /
'bring /
'di mtsho smad mkhan chen shAkya dbang phyug gi gsan yig na chos tshan gnyis par ngos bzung 'dug pa thems yig gi brjod bya dang 'gal bar mngon /
de dang brjod don cha 'dra'i rdo rje thugs kyi sgrub (byang?)se? ba'i lo rgyus las can min ba su rung rung dang ba'i thugs sgrub 'di mi phrad pa'i mtha' can /
byang khog lus dang dpe mthun ba'iH. sku gsung thugs kyi gnad 'dus yodH. ces pa'i thems can sku gsung thugs kyi gnang 'dus la rdo rje he ru ka thugs kyi sgrub 'bring /
thabs yang tig (byang?)se? gsang ba gser gyi 'bru gcig ma /
'bring /
'di sngags 'chang bkra bzang ba'i gsan yig na thems med du mdzad pa'i blar dkyil 'khor bcud dril dang /
thems can la sku gsung thugs kyi gnad 'dus zer ba zhig 'dug bang lta dpe rgyun la lar phal cher he ru ka'i thugs sgrub 'di dang zhus ngag pher ba'i ming mi gcig pa gcig dang /
gsang ba rin chen 'dus par mjug tu 'dra min cung zad yod pa'i bcud dril du ming btags pa zhig 'dug pa de gnyis ni ma dag pa'i rgyun 'byams 'khyar ba 'dra las brjod don lhag po gang yang ma mthong zhing /
de las gzhan pa ma rnyed 'on kyang bkra bzang ba chen po phyogs 'dir tshang thub kyi mkhas par 'dug pas dpyad par bya'o /
tsit+ta snying dang dpe mthun pa'iH. gsang ba rin cen 'dus pa yongH. ces pa'i thems can gyi bla ma'i thugs sgrub chen mo /
(byang?)se? gsang ba rin cen 'dus pa zhes pa snang srid lha 'dres bkar nyan srog snying 'bul zhes pa yan gyis tshang nas bar du brda yig kha shas bris mthar de ltar thugs kyi bsnyen pa'i rtags rdzogs nasH. zhes sogs dkyus gcig tu bris pa dpe rnying phal cher la yong 'bring /
zhing don gyi chos tshan gcig /

'on kyang dpe khungs btsun mang por dkyil 'khor bcu dril zhes legs su bgrangs ba mthong bas slar yang phyogs 'dir tshang thub kyi mkhas pa rnyed na dpyad bar bya'o /
de yang sku gsung thugs kyi gnad 'dus las /
nyin zhag re la thugs kyi snying po 'diH. nyi khri chig stong slon du bsnyen pa'i gnadH. gsang sngags lho tshil snying tig kun gyi srogH. dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus kun gyi thugsH. khams gsum sems can ma lus kun gyi semsH. snang srid lha srin snge brgyad kun gyi srogH. bstan pa'i dam chos ma lus kun gyi chibsH. 'di nyid yin na nam zhog dus kyi cheH. zhes dang /
dngos grub blang thabs las /
lan gsum bsgrubs na dngos grub rnam gnyis 'thobH. rigs 'dzin gral la the tshom yod ri skanH. zhes bde gshegs kun gyi dgongs ba rigs 'dzin padma'i thugs gyi nying khu phrad 'tshengs shin tu zab pa'i gsang lam mthar thug pa'o / /
thems med la thugs sgrub gsang ba rin cen 'dus @# / /
pa (byang?)se? zhes bla ma yum can dang dpa' bo ging bzhi yab yum gyi bsnyen sgrub zab pa'i mthar thug pa thugs sgrub gsang ba'i gter mdzod /
che /
las sbyor gnad kyi man ngag (byang?)se? ces pa snang srid yon tan thams cad bsdu ba dang zhar byung 'phrin las bzhi'i kha bsgyur dang bcas pa me gsang ba rin cen 'dus pa thams cad drag po rtsal gyi nyams len dngos gzhi dang thems med ni drag po rtsal gyi gsang sgrub yin pa'i brjod don mi gcig pa mgo bar byang gter bar rlom pa 'di gong gi? 'phrom dang spril? nam yod zangs mdzod nas byon /
'gas gsang ba rin cen 'dus ba tshar gnyis yod zer /

des mdzad pa'i rtsa ba'i dmigs pa'i gnas? bogs 'don gegs sel /

! lung bstan dang sbas yul lam yig gi skor la /
ma 'ongs lung bstan padma'i bskul byang chen po lus kyi gzhung shing 'dra ba bod kyi sngags ban rgyal blon 'bangs rnams kyi ngan spyod dar ba dang de la brten nas sdug bsngal 'byung tshul dang thems byang bdun yod tshul sogs bstan pa /
ma 'ongs pa'i lung byang thems byang bdun pa zhes pa bdud dmag sde dgu g.yo ba'i dus su mi rtag bskul ba'i thems byang /
rtsa ba brlag pa'i bdud gsum g.yo ba'i ro zlog bsgyur bsrung ba'i thems byang /
nang 'khrug g.yo ba'i tshe btsan sa bsnyeg pa'i thems byang /

phur zhus pa /
ayon chen pos bod kyi mi rnams mi dga' gsungs nas gshegs pa rab rtsams pa'i dus mnga' bdag gis bzhugs par gsol nas gdams pa brgya rtsa brgyad dang lung bstan che 'bring chung gsum sogs gsungs pa'i dus tshogs mchod brgya rtsa mdzad pa'i tshe mtha' dmag sde dgus bod 'joms pa'i dus 'bros pa'i yul gyi sbas yul rnams don bsdus te bstan pa le grangs med kyang mjug tu le'u drug pa zer ba yod / /
gter chen 'di gdon pa'i dus bod kyi rgyal po dang dge 'dun 'bangs rnams ji ltar 'byung dang bde sdug sogs kyi lung bstan mkha' 'gro ye shes 'tsho rgyal gyis zhus pa /
zab gter 'di nyid kyis bod la phan pa'i rten 'brel dang dus rtags sogs bstan pa'i lung byang brgyad cu par grags pa /
bod rnams sbas yul du 'gro ba'i dus la babs pa'i lung bstan /
sbas yul spyi'i thems byang zhes pa slob dpon chen po mchims phur ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs pa'i skabs mnga' bdag gis bsam yas su spyan drangs nas tshogs brgya mdzad pa'i dus gsungs pa'i sbas yul du 'gro ngan pa'i phyi nang gi dus rtags 'dud kyi dug mda' bsrung ba dang sbas yul nges par rnyed pa'i thabs sogs bstan pa'i mjug tu /
ayon rgyal po padma ngasH. sa rong btsan pa'i yul phran rnamsH. sa btul byin rlabs gter chen sbasH. sgo ba sgo srungs bka' nyan bskosH. de phyir sbas pa'i yul kun naH. sgrub gnas re dang gnas chen reH. bka' rtags yin pas gzhag par byaH. nga yis byin brlabs sgrub gnas suH. nga yul bu yis 'dzin pa ltarH. the tshom med par 'dzin du bzhudH. skye ba 'di yi phyi ma laH. nga dang phrad par the tshom medH. bka' 'di'i dus na bod kyi las ngan gyiH. shis ngan gri ru 'chi bas lung 'di nyonH. zhes sogs yod pa /
sbas yul 'bras mo ljongs kyi lam yig le'u drug pa mjug tu chos kyi blon po brgyad kyis lung rtags bka' bgros pa 'phags pa zab mo'i lung bdun par yang grags la /
lha sras mu khri btsan pos slob dpon chen po la rin cen ga'u 'di rnams /
'di gsang ba rmad byung gi cha lag tu gtogs kyang thob yig tu chos kyi sde tshan du mi 'di 'dug /

e ma /
dregs pa kun gyi nang nas rdzu 'phrul canH. rno dar ldan pa'i spu gri cog brdung 'diH dus kyi snyigs ma bstan pa 'jig pa'i dusH. chos 'khor gtsug lag 'jig cing kun la 'tshe?H ma rungs gdug pa'i ru tra sdig spyod canH. de dag sgrol phyir bdag 'dra padmas bsdebsH. zhes dregs pa'i sde dpon rnams kyi nang nas mthu dang rdzu 'phrul shin tu che zhing myur ba drang srong khyab 'jug rA hu la dug gi spu gri'i chos skor phra mo bag gi klu mo stag gdong gi lto ba nas sprul sku las 'brel rtsal gyis gdan drangs pa'i skor la /

ayon nga yi byin rlabs kyisH. bu gcig lnga bcu kha ral gyi dusH. dbus gtsang mtha' dbus 'khrug cing rgyal khams chu ltar 'kholH. las mi dge ba la sbyodH. sbyod ngan rang gis byas nas dus ngan zer zhingH. bdud sbrul bcu gsum dus gcig 'dzom bas sems can gyi bde skyid 'ja' ltar yalH. gti mug gi ngo bo nad yam darH. 'dod chags kyi ngo bo mu ge dar ba'i dusH. skyes bu shes rab kyi ming can zhabs la 'khor lo padma 'dab brgyad pas brgyan paH. snying gar phag mo rang byung du bzhugs paH. rtsa'i rtse na ye shes kyi sor gnyis su nar re yod baH. dam tshig tshul bzhin bsrung baH. mkha' 'gro ma lngas nye gnas byed pa zhig skye par 'gyur roH. des 'di nyid 'donH. zhes pa ltar kong po sba gdong nas sprul sku shes rab me 'bar gyis sbyan drangs ba'i rdzogs pa chen po 'khor 'das rang grol gyi skor la /

rgyab rten lung la /
thebs yig rin cen lde mig gser gyi maN+Dal la g.yu'i phra bcug pa 'dra ba yin pas spel zhig gi mtha' can /
lo rgyus rin cen lde mig mig 'byed chen mo le'u brgyad pa rdzogs byang gi mtha' can /
rgyud kyi rgyal po 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i snying por gyur pa snang stong dbyer med sku gsum ston pa'i sgra tshig 'khor 'das rang grol rtsa ba @# / /

dbang bzhi'i sngon 'gro rin cen gsal ba'i me long rin cen spar bkab ces bya ba gsal ba'i sgron me rdzogs byang gi mtha' can /
breg mchog dbang gi dngos gzhi'i rim pa dbang chog dang bcas pa bzhi rdzogs chen mo yig rigs brgya rtsa brgyad du gtan la phab pa rdzogs so'i mtha' can /

padma 'byung gnas bdag gis kyangH. phyi rabs bstan pa bsrung ched duH. srog mtshan nag po'i 'khrul 'khor 'diH. rta mgrin rgyal po nyid la sbasH. las 'phro can dang phrad par shogH. ces pa ltar bum thang dge gnas lha khang gi khro bo rta mgrin gyi mtshan ma nas sbur po bya'u mgon gyis sbyar drangs pa'i srog mtshan pa nag po bum thang srog 'khor la /

za yig nor bu'i bang mdzod las /

thog mar lta ba glong yangs kyi thems yig rin cen sgron ma /
de las byung ba'i chos skor la /
lus lta bu rgyud kyi skor /
mgo bo lta bu lo rgyus skor /
nang khrol lta bu dbang gi skor /
yan lag lta bu gzhan don skor /
dbang po lta bu blo 'phel skor /
don snying lta bu 'khrid skor /

sor mo lta bu man ngag skor /

lus bsrung gi go mtshon lta bu chos skyong skor dang bcu gcig /
dang po ni /
theg pa thams cad kyi spyi phud ltwa ba glong chen yangs pa chen po'i rgyud chen 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi las khol du phyung ba le'u lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa /
gnyis pa mgo bo lta bu lo rgyus skor la /
yid ches shing khungs btsun pa rdzogs chen babs lugs kyi rab 'byed chen mo'i lo rgyus don gyi lde mig tu grags pa /
lo rgyus rin po che'i mdo byad dri med nam mkha' glong yangs kyi rgyud ces pa shrI sid+ha dang 'jam dpal bshes gnyen phyi ma ayon be ro bi mA la dang dz+nyA na su tra mjal ba yan la le'u bcu dgu de man la le'u'i par bka' med pa rdzogs byang gi mtha' can /
gsum pa nang khrol lta bu dbang gi skor la /
dbang bzhi'i sngon 'gro padma'i ljon shing le'u brgyad pa /
dbang bzhi'i spyi chings khyud chen lding pa ayon padmas bkod pa le'u sum cu pa rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
'gor bgegs 'dul khro bo chen po bcus zhes yod pa'i khyud lding gi dbang byad gung du bkol ba dpe chung du grags pa 'bar ba me'i skol sbyong gi mtha' can /
theg pa bcu gcig dbang gi khrigs rin po che'i 'phreng ba rdzogs byang gi mtha' can /
phyi spros bcas zhi ba byang chub sems kyi bum dbang chen mo rin cen them skas bsam yas mchims phu dge gong padma phug gi lho phyogs gnas @# / /
lcags 'bar bar gter du sbas pa /
zhi ba'i lha dbang chen mo'i phra thig lo baN gnyis kyis shrI'i gsung bzhin lhag chad med par bkod pa yig cha dang lag len 'thor ba phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs nas b+h+rom ston chos rjes mdzad pa'i zhi ba byang chub sems kyi bum dbang rtsal 'phreng /
thems med /
phyi ltar zhi ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su sgrub thabs rdzogs byang gi mtha' can /
nang ltar zhi ba kun bzang rigs lngar sgrub thabs rdzogs byang gi mtha' can /
gsang ba ltar zhi ba rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba chig dril du sgrub thabs rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
'di'i shog ser gyi yig mkhan lha lcam nus 'byin rtsal yin zer ba snang /
phyi sbros bcas bum pa'i dbang khro bo rin cen them skas le'u zhe drug pa rjes kyi le'u gnyis dang zhe brgyad pa'o'i mtha' can /
khro bo rdzogs pa'i dbang mo che rig pa'i ngo sbod ces pa lha dbang chen mo'i phra thig pang 'byung bai ro tsa nas shrI'i lung bzhin lhag chad med par bris pa /
yi ge dang phyag len 'thor ba phyogs gcig tu b+h+rom ston chos rjes bsdebs nas bkod pa'i khro bo'i bum dbang lag len gsal ba'i sgron ma mu tig 'phreng ba /
thems med /
phyi ltar khro bo lnga bcu rtsa brgyad du sgrub pa lo paN bka' bgros nas yi ger btab pa /
'di'i 'og tu nang khro chen 'dus pa rtsal du sgrub thabs yang gsang chig drel dga' rab rdo rje'i thugs bcud ces pa dpe ma 'byor bsam thob /
zhi khro dam pa rigs brgya rdo rje sems dpa' yi ge brgya par dril te bsgrub pa bya sla tshegs chung khyad par can /
dbang rnams la dgos pa'i byin 'bebs chen mo gdod ma ka dag ma byin 'bebs 'phrin las so'a mtha' can /
byin 'bebs kyi phra thig bka' srung gter bdag gi mtha' can /
gtor dbang gi phra tig rig pa mdud tshugs su ngo sprod pa dga' rab rdo rje'i phyag bzhes /
dbang dus su myul le skrod pa'i ging bskul bstod pa dang bcas pa'i phra tig kun bzang zhi khro'i lha tshogs ma /
ging bskul gyi yig chung zhes pa rtags dang bskul phyogs bcu dur khrod ma /
thems med /
spros med nang gi gsang dbang rin po che 'khor lo le'u bzhi pa /
de'i phra tig bla na med pa don gyi 'khor lo / /
'gor gsang sngags dbang gi ngo sprod skabs zhes pa'i gsang dbang phra thig gi lhan thabs mig tshags rdzogs byang gi mtha' can /
gsang dbang gi gnad byang phyag rgya ma smin byed rigs gso ba'i dbang chog bdud rtsi dri med /
'gor dga' bzhi'i bde stong stsol mdzad pa'i zhes yod pa'i gsang ba dgyes bstod kyi phra tig /
shin tu sbros med shes rab ye shes gsang ba'i dbang padma 'bar ba ye shes brtsegs pa le'u brgyad pa dga' rab rdo rjes mdzad pa /
shin tu spros med shes rab ye shes kyi phra tig gsal ba'i sgron me /
'gor ti la nyag gcig mtha' dbus bral zhes yod pa'i rab tu spros med rig pa'i rtsal dbang tshig dbang rin po cha sa ni bcu gcig kun tu 'od kyi mtha' can /
gud du sbas pa bsam yas dbu rtse steng khang ka ba'i khong gseng nas bton pa'i rab 'byams bka'i dbang gi skor la nang gses kyi rdo rje rgyal po'i bka' gtad rab 'byams rgyud kyi rgyal po /
dbang gi chu bo bzhi babs tshul gyi lo rgyus /
de'i rgyud las phyung ba yongs su 'dzin pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang la brten nas phyi'i chas brgyad sprul ba'i skur bskur thabs /
bka' po ti glegs bam gyi dbang la brten nas nang gi chas brgyad longs spyod rdzogs skur @# / /
bskur thabs /
rig pa'i rtsal dbang la brten nas gsang ba'i chas brgyad chos kyi skur bskur thabs /
yongs rdzogs phyag rgya chen po mchog gi dbang la brten nas dbang gi chas bcu mi 'gyur rdo rjer bskur thabs /
sku lnga'i bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po lta ba sbyi 'byams kyi dbang bskur thabs /
de dag gi rgyab chos su 'gor kun tu bzang po dgongs pa'i tshig 'di ltar zhes yod pa'i mkhas pa nyi shu rtsa lnga dang bai ro'i glu rgyal thabs spyi blugs kyi dbang mo che glur blangs so'i mtha' can rnams /
bzhi pa yan lag lta bu 'phrin las gzhan don skor la /
zhi ba'i las byang yang dag don gyi 'phrin las le'u gsum pa /
khro bo'i las byang rin cen zer 'phro sngon 'gro dngos gzhi rjes gsum gyis bstan pa rdzogs byang gi mtha' can /
'gor bsgral chog gi las rim ni zhes yod pa'i bsgral chog gi phra thig ma bcos lhang nger zhog gi mtha' can /
'di gnyis ka thems med 'gor 'dir sgrol ba'i dgos pa tshe lung dang zhes yod pa'i tshe lung khrus lung gi dgongs pa slob bu shangs ba brgya tsho bas bskul ngor gter ston gyis lung nag phugs stod dge ba'i gnas su yi ger bkod pa /
zhi khro gnyis kyi tshe sgrub 'od zer dra ba las rim bcu gnyis pa dbang dang bcas pa /
de'i lag len phra tig tshe dbang rin po che 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rgyud chung le'u bzhi pa /
mtha' rten bkra shis rtags brgyad kyi dbang bskur thabs /
thems med rten gsum rab tu gnas par bya ba'i gdams pa ye shes gsum ldan gyi cho ga rgyas par bstan pa /
spros ba nye bar bsdus ba /
sbros med don gyi rab tu gnas pa bya tshul gsum chos sde gcig tu bzhugs pa /
'gor rdo rje 'chang gi bka' bzhin du zhes yod pa'i ro sreg phung po 'dul sbyang rgyud las bkol ba shes bar bya'o'i mtha' can /
tshe 'das gnas 'dren gyi man ngag gnas lung chen mo thugs rje'i lcags kyu rgyal sras chos rje'i gsung bzhin rin po che bkra shis mtshan can gyis bsdebs pa gnas lung gi cha lag gshin po zas gtad kyi cho ga rim pa nyi shu pa rnams /
lnga pa dbang po lta bu blo 'phel skor ni /
slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis lo gsum la sh+lo ka drug las ma zin par 'di bsgrubs pas chos sgo kun la mkhas tshul gyi lo rgyus yod pa'i 'jam dpal blo'i mun sel gyi sgrub thabs bla rdo gnad yig dang bcas pa /
drug pa don snying lta bu 'khrid kyi skor la /
sngon 'gro rigs drug dong sprugs kyi 'khrid yig ma rig mun sel sgron me /
rigs drug tu shan dbye ba'i spyod pa la bslab pa'i lag 'khrid rigs drug dong sprugs /
theg pa bcu gcig gi 'khrid yig 'od zer dra ba /
lus ngag yid gsum skye med du grol ba'i 'khrid yig gsal byed me long /
lam 'khrid sems kyi rtsa ba gcod byed a ti'i 'khrid yig 'od zer dra ba le'u dgu pa /
rdzogs chen 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i yang bcud lag 'khrid cig car ba dbang po yang rab grol byed ar gtad lag 'khrid nyi ma'i snying po ma rig mig 'byed /
sku gsum gyi ngo sprod a ti'i khong snying gsal ba'i me long lag len myong bas thebs par mdzod phrad shog gi mtha' can rnams /
bdun pa snying shun lta bu kha skong skor la /

pa'i 'phrul gyi dpa brgyad kyi zhal gdams /

sku gsum gyi 'bras bu mngon du gtan la 'bebs pa'i thabs mchog rin cen rgyab yig ngo sprod nyi shu rtsa lnga pa nyi ma dang 'dra 'bag gal che'o'i mtha' can rnams /
'di la ngo sprod nyi shu rtsa lnga par grags kyang nyer lnga nyer gcig sags cad gses su sna tshogs snang /

mkha' 'gro yid bzhin nor bu'i lo rgyus /

rang byung gi chos tshig thams cad rang shar ba'i glegs bam sh+lo ka bdun pa bstan pa kun gyi thog ma kun bzang dgongs ba'i rgyud bcangs pas dran 'chang rgya ba'i tan+ta /

ston ba brtse ba'i blo gros kyi 'das rjes rdo rje'i tsheg drug ba /

rang gter las /
de dus rdo rje drag po rtsalH. ayon nga yi sgrub thabs 'diH su 'chang 'dzin pa nga rang dngosH. de la bar gcod ga la chugsH. rdo rje pha lam ral gri 'draH. dpal ri 'od kyi rtse mo nasH. de la g.yeng ba med par skyobH. ces thugs sgrub drag po'i chos skor kun gyi nang nas shin tu zab pa byin rlabs nus ldan gyi skor la thog mar dbang chog rdo rje spyi blugs kyi steng nas /

sna bo la khar so ba re mos byedH. mchod rten dkar por sbas pa'i gter kha niH. mi bzhag gdon pa'i ltas de bstan nas 'byungH. gter ston kun skyong gling pa zhes bya 'byungH. zhes dang /
rang gter las /
bai ro khyod kyi sprul pa niH. chu khams bya'am khyi lo paH. yab med yum bral sngags 'chang rigsH. ayon ming 'dzin shes rab canH. ma nges spyod pa 'gro ba 'dulH. gnas med rlung bzhin kun tu rgyuH. mon bal rtse lnga phyogs su 'da'H. thugs gter dgong gter mang zhig 'byedH. ces pa ltar lo chen bai po'i rnam sprul rgyal ba'i sras po rdo rje gling ba'i sku skye padma kun skyong gling pas mi tshor rdo rje skye brag nas khro las grub pa'i gter sgrom r+wa hu la'i gzugs mda' gang pa spyan drangs pa'i thugs ka nas byon pa'i theg dgu'i yang rtse rdor sems snying thig ni /
rang gter las /
rgyud mchog 'di nyid la brten nasH. spros med mya ngan 'das don duH. spros pa'i tshig mchog kun bsdus nasH. nyams len gnad kyi gdams pa brtsamsH. 'di nyid be ro khyod la gtadH. da lta spel ba'i gnas med deH. phyi ma snyigs ma lnga bdo'i dusH. khyod kyi sprul pa shes rab canH. skal ldan gcig gi don du sbedH. ces snying tig bcu gsum gyi don btus pa dga' rab rdo rjes ayon chen po la gnang ba'i rdzogs pa chen po tshig nyung don rgyas gnad kyi gdams skor la /

lo ni lnga bcu kha ral dusH. nyi ma shar lho'i phyogs dag tuH. chos kyi rgyal po rat+na glingH. 'phrin las bzhi la mnga' brnyes paH. 'tsho rgyal khyod kyi sprul pa'amH. byin gyis brlabs pa'i skyes bu 'byungH zhes dang /
gter kha 'og ma'i sku gsum sgrub pa'i lung byang las /
'di nas byang phyogs shing sgo'i mchamsH. ri bo khyung chen 'dra ba'i barH lug po padma dbang chen rtsaH. bskyed rdzogs don la mkhas pa 'byungH. zhes dang /
gu ru jo rtse'i gter lung lasH. mon bu spyi ring sku yi lwa ba canH ri bo kyung chen lding pa'i zhol du 'byungH. zhas sogs gter kha mang bo nas lung gis zin pa'i gter ston rin cen dbal bzang zhes lang 'gro lo tsA dkon cog 'byung gnas kyi skye ba 'di nyid ni /
rang gter bstan pa spyi lung las /
lnga bcu kha ral dus kyi mtha' ma laH. da lta'i lo tsA yang 'gro dkan cog 'diH. smon lam dbang gis skye ba bka' brgyud nasH. da dus ri bo khyung chen lding ba'i lhorH. lcags khams lug lo padma'i rigs can 'byungH. khyud chen ri dang mkhar chu'i zab gter 'donH. gsang ba'i mtshan yang zhig po gling ba yinH. gung thang dge ri rdzong gsum gter kha 'donH. gsang pa'i mtshan yang rat+na gling bar gragsH. bsam yas gnam skas bum thang gter kha 'donH. gsang ba'i mtshan yang 'gro 'dul gling par gragsH stobs ldan skyes bu shes rab blo gros canH. don gyi rtags ldan 'dul bya'i bka' babs paH. 'brel tshad don ldan padma'i rigs canH. bu mchog de yis don gnyis spyod bar 'gyurH zhes gter gnas so so'i dbang gis gter ston gcig la gling pa gsum gyi mtshan du lung gis zin zhing rten 'brel ma 'grog pa'i bar gcod kyi dbang du song na sprul sku tshul rdor ltar gling ba so so'i mtshan can gyi skye ba rim par brgyud dgos rgyu la /
lung bstan bka' rgya chung ba las /

mkha' 'gro'i gsang gter snying po'i bcud 'di laH. snying dang snying khrag dangs ma'i skor gsum mchisH. glong gsal snying thig thugs srog snying gi tshulH. thems yig med rnams gsang ba snying khrag steH sbas chos lnga po srog gi dangs ma'i tshulH. zhes snying dang snying khrag dangs ma'i tshul gsum du gsungs pa ltar /

ye shes dbab rdzas rtsa yi sbas bshad dangH. zab lam rgyab yig bcud skyed sha sbyor dangH. rdo rje them skas rigs brgyud brtag thabs dangH. dbang bskur snying bsgul gsang pa yang gces dangH. bde skyid rdzas sbyor srid gcod bka' rgya rnamsH. lo bdun 'grogs pa'i brtag thub snying gi buH tshe 'di blos btang snying nas chos byed ba'iH. snying gi bu chen lnga las spel mi rungH. zhes pa ltar ye shes dngos su dbab pa'i man ngag mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i rdzas pha? sbyor brgyud 'dzin gcig las mi spel ba'i mtha' can /

gsang ba'i yang 'khol ka? 'khor lo gsum gyi 'dri thabs /

'khor ba rtsad gcod rdzas sbyor zab ka? mo sri gcod yid bzhin nor bu phrad shog gi mtha' can /
sprul sha sogs rdzas la brten pa'i srid gcod @# / /
bka' rgya ma /
lus kyi drong skyed rdzas kyi sbyor ba dangH. stobs bskyed ba dang sa rdo'i bcud len dangH. tshe 'di'i lto gos g.yeng bsel pa'i phyirH. snying nas chos byed dang ldan 'ga' la sbyinH. tshe yi bcud du rlung gi sbyor ba dangH. ma chag tu zab pa 'byung pa'i 'chi blu gnyisH. dam chos tshul bzhin spyod pa 'ga' re lasH. mang du ma spel rang gi snying la chongsH. zhes ba ltar /
gtum mo'i rgyab yig lus kyi drod skyed rdzas pha? sbyor rigs mi gcig pa lngas gos kyi g.yeng ba sal bzhar byung zhabs rjen bya thabs /
lus stobs bskyed cing zas kyi sred ba spong ba rin cen sa'i bcud len ka? gter kha gsum las ri mo can du sbas pa /
cung zhi sogs rdo'i bcung len la ka? brten nas tshe 'dir rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ba /
tshe bcud bsdu ba'i tshe sgrub bka' rgya shin tu zab pa'i mthar thug pa /
shin tu zab ka? ba 'byung ba'i 'chi blubs sgam nag por gtams ba /
lung bstan bka' rgya gter bdag sprul sku'i lungH. lung byang skor gsum chos bdag slob ma'i lungH. bstan ba spyi lung gang zag 'di gong ma dang phal cher 'dra 'dug pas gzhan yod med brtag /
sgos lung dangH. mtha' dbus 'khrug tshul gter ston slob ma'i lungH. lung skor de rnams rab tu gces na yangH brtag grub snying gi bu rnams ma gtogs paH. mang du spel na gshe skur sgrog gzhi dangH. log lta can rnams sdig gsog rkyen du 'gyurH. zhes pa ltar /
gter bdag sprul sku'i skyes rabs lung bstan pha? gsal ba'i sgron me'am lung bstan bka' rgya ma phrad shog gi mtha' can /
lung bstan bka' rgya chung ba pha? snyigs dus 'gro ba'i dpal du shar ba'i mtha' can /
bstan pa spyi dang gang zag sgos lung mtha' dbus 'khrug pa gter brdzus zog pa brtag tshul sogs rgyas par gsal bar zur? ston pa'i lung bstan chen mo phrad shos gi mtha' can rnams /
lnga pa srog gi dangs ma lta bu sbas chos gsang ba yang tig sgor la /
rgyud bcu bdun /
glong gsal nyi ma'i rgyud mnyam sbyor rgyud rnams kyi bcud dril pha? ba zab chos gsang ba yang tig thems yig bka' rgya ma phrad shog gi mtha' can /
thabs pha dang 'dra ba khregs chod ka dag gi ngo sprod don gsal snying po'i gsal 'khrid pha? lo gsum gyi gong nas zhu ba phul te gser dang sman gyi maN+Dal tshogs 'khor dang bcas dgos pa bka' 'di thub par srungs shig gi mtha' can /
shes rab ma dang 'dra ba rgya mtsho 'od gsal mun 'khrid pha? gser gyi maN+Dal tshogs 'khor zhu ba lan gsum ma re phul rjes ston pa phrad shog gi mtha' can /
gtsas pa bu dang mtshungs ba dus bzhi mnyam sbyor pha? dang 'brel bar khor yug tu nyams su len pa phyi nang gsang gsum gyi gdams pa 'gro ba dpag med grol bar shog gi mtha' can /
mthong bas grol ba'i gdams pa bar ro'i ngo sprod sangs rgyas lag bcangs spra 'khrid srog gzer du bstan pa'i sbas pha? chos don bzhi ba yang bces srog gi dangs mdzo mo 'tsho rgyal dang gnubs nam snying la gnang ba tshogs 'khor dang gser dang 'bru'i maN+Dal lan gsum re dbul dgos pa /
dpral ba'i mig las gces ba spra 'khrid bar do'i zhal pha? gdams nyams su blang thabs gsum gyi sgo nas bar ngo bzhi'i lam 'khyer bstan pa phrad shog gi mtha' can /
mthong bas grol ba'i gdams ba gsang ba thig le'i yang zhun pha? mngon sum snying ti @# / /
gi man ngag bar do gnad kyi me long dam med la shor ra re'i mtha' can /
de'i bu yi g.yang gces sbas pa zhi khro'i ngo sprod pha? phrug phrad sangs rgyas lag 'khrid snying gi dum bu bstan pa mtha' rgyas shog gi mtha' can /
rgyal ba rdo rje sems dpa'i dgongs pa bstan pa thams cad kyi bu gcig pa'i pha? rgyud rdzogs byang phrad shog gi mtha' can /
rgyud kyi rgyal po gter gyi yang snying pha? mngon shes rang byung rig pa rgyal po'i rgyud rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sras gcig pa gsang ba spyod pa sa bon gcig shes pha? kun grol gyi rgyud rdzogs so'i mtha' can zhar byung du glegs bam bri ba /

bklag pa /
phan yon bcas bstan pa /
mngon shes rig pa rgyal po'i rgyud kyi don 'grel chen pha? mo gter gyi yang snying srog gi dang mthugs kyi sgon me gnubs nam mkha'i snying pos mkhar chu gsang phug tu bris ba /
rig pa gnad dgu'i btags grol shin tu zab pha? pa zhal gdams dang bcas pa bstan pa dar ba dang phrad shog gi mtha' can /
btags grol rab tu gnas shing rgyud bcang pha? ba dbang bskur dang bcas pa las can mang bo grol bar shog gi mtha' can /

'gro don rgya chen bya ba'i phyir ji ltar bklag pa'i thabs pha? bstan pa gsang bar gyis kyi mtha' can zhar la dga' rab rdo rjes shrI sid+ha la rgyud che ba bdun dang bcas gtad tshul /

yang gces sbas pa'i yang snying tsha ba dmar thag gi gdams pa ka dag lhun grub zung pha? 'jug gi ngo sprad sangs rgyas lag bcangs su ston pa'am sku gsum gzhi lam 'bras gsum du ngo sprod ba thugs kyi yang zhun mkhar chen bzas bris pa'i mtha' can /

brtag pa /
nyin mtshan kha sbyor 'od dkar ar gtad dangH. gnad 'bebs dang 'jug sgra yi chos dang lngaH dam gtsang bka' nyan lus dang longs spyod dbulH. nyams len sgrub la mna' rgya nus pa yiH. bu min gzhan la bstan na dam tshig nyamsH. gsang ba'i gnad yig 'od gsal 'khor lo 'diH. dam med lus kyi bu la sbyin mi rungH. zhes pa ltar /
zab pa'i nang nas yang zab thugs kyi bcud sbas pa'i nang nas spras pa snying gi nang nas kyang snying srog thigs pa gsang ba'i gzer thig yang pha? gces bdun pa phrad @# / /
shog gi mtha' can chig brgyud las mi spel zhing sgrub pa'i dam bca' lo gsum gser g.yu'i maN+Dal lan gsum phul nas rten 'brel brtag dgos pa /

dang po ni /
sangs rgyas bstan pa 'dzin skyong bsrung ba'i phyirH bka' srung dam can phan gnod las tshogs skorH. ma 'ongs don du ayon bdag gas sbasH. ma ning nag po dril sgrub spu gri 'diH gter kha 'di yi spyi srung chen po steH. bka' rdzogs lung zin bu mchog ma gtogs paH. spel du ma rung gces pa'i srog bzhin bcangH. zhes pa ltar gtar kha 'di'i chos bka' spyi'i srung ma ye shes kyi mgon po ma ning dril sgrub spu gri'i skor gter gnas kyi dbang du byas thugs sgrub yang snying 'dus pa'i chos sder 'os na'ang /

rtsa ba'i sgrub pa rang bsrung gnad 'bebsH. srog tig ol dgag 'khor gyi the'u brang gsumH. dug 'byin gsol kha bkang gso la sags paH. brgyud 'dzin bu mchog bstan pa bsrung ba laH. ! chos rgyal rat+na gling bas gnyal smad dge ri spyang dmar chos rdzong gi gsang phug dmar po glang ru'i dbyibs 'dra ba nas spyan drangs pa'i zab chos ni /
bka'i rgya thems rin cen sgrom bu las /
'di ni rjes 'jug su dang sus bsgrubs kyangH. rnga yab gnas nas gu ru padma yisH. rgyun chad med par thugs rjes mi 'dzin riH. the tshom med dang dam tshig gtsang ba gcesH. gsol ba thob cig rjes 'jug rigs ldan rnamsH. bu la dungs ba'i ma ltar bdag gis skyobH. nyams dang rmi lam dngos kyi tshul du yangH. tshul bzhin sgrub pa'i bu dang zhal mjal nasH. ngo sprod dbang bskur chos 'chang lung yang stonH. bslus na padma zhan no rjes 'jug rnamsH. zhes pa'i brjod don ltar thugs sgrub kun gyi nang nas zab cing rgya che ba don 'dril ba bka' gsang snying po'i yang zhun /
rigs 'dzin grub thob rnams kyi thugs bcud /
bod yul sa 'og kun gyi gtar gcig ma /
thugs sgrub yang snying 'dus pa yid bzhin gyi snying po bsam 'phel lta bu'i chos skor la /
thog mar ras bris kyi dkyil 'khor du sta gon dang 'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba'i me tog 'phreng ba /
rtsa ba'i dbang lnga rnam ba nyi shus byang chub pa /
rjes gnang gi dbang rim brgyad /

lha dbang /
sku gsung thugs kyi rjes gnang /

rjes su gnang ba 'grin las brgyad kyi dbang /
dam tshig bsgrag cing the tshom gcod pa dang bcas so / /

rgyab rten lung la /
thugs sgrub yongs rdzogs yang snying 'dus pa'i bka' rgya thems byang rin cen sgrom bu /
de nyid las /
gdams pa 'di la chos skor rim gsum steH. sgrub dang sgrub chen kha skong las tshogs skorH. zhes gsungs pa ltar /
spros med rang don tshe gcig sangs rgyas sgrub pa bla ma sku gsum sgrub pa'i skor /
spros bcas gzhan don du 'khor tshom bu dang bcas byang chub bsgrub bsgrub pa chen po'i skor /
de dag gi mtshang ba'i kha skong zhing 'phrin las gzhan phan sgrub pa las sna tshogs pa'i skor dang gsum /
dang po la /
bsnyen sgrub dmar 'khrid sgrub ba'i khog 'bubs dangH. sku gsum rang rang sgrub pa'i skor la gsumH. snying bo'i gdams pa gsang 'khrid rim lnga dangH. sku gsum thugs 'khor sgrub pa'i kha skong yinH. de bas mang nyung byung na lhag chad deH. mthar thug snying po'i don yin snying la chongsH. zhes pa ltar /
bla ma sku gsum sgrub pa'i khog phub sbyor ba spra 'khrid chen mo don gsum gyis bstan pa bsnyen sgrub kho na'i sgrub khog /
bla ma sprul skur bsgrub ba bsnyen sgrub las sbyor gsum tshang ba zab pa'i mthar thug /
bla ma longs sku'i sgrub ba bsnyen sgrub las sbyor tshang ba mthar thug don gyi snying bo ayon gsung bzhin nam mkha'i snying bos bris pa /
bla ma chos sku'i sgrub thabs sgrub pa kun gyi snying mchog ayon thugs kyi yang bcud gsang sgrub rjes kyi las sbyor dang bcas pa /
gu ru sku lnga'i gsang 'khrid rim pa lnga ba zhes pa 'dod chags kyi ngo bo sbyang ba bde stong gtum mo'i 'khrid /
zhe sdang @# / /
gi ngo bo spyang ba sgyu lus bar ngo'i 'khrid /
gti mug gi ngo bo sbyang ba rmi lam 'od gsal gyi 'khrid /
nga rgyal gyi ngo bo sbyang ba mnyam nyid phyag chen gyi 'khrid /
phrag dog gi ngo po sbyang ba srogs 'don gsang spyod kyi 'khrid rnams ston pa mkhar chen bzas yi ger bkod pa /
sgrub ba la bar gcad mi 'byung zhing dngos grub char ltar 'bebs pa steng 'khar gsang 'khor 'og 'khor rnams kyi bris? yig /
rtsa gsum rang dang 'du 'bral med pa'i gces gnad bla rdo srog 'khar bri yig dang bcang thabs bstan pa /
gsang 'khrid gtum mo'i cha lag lus sbyong 'khrul 'khor rtsa tshig /
thems med rtsa rlung thig le'i zab mo gnad kyi gegs sel tshig brgyud ma gtogs mi spel ba padma'i shangs mtshal la snag cha byas te byin rlabs kyi yi ger bkod pa /

chos kyi khungs bcun che ba bskyed pa'i phyirH. lo rgyus man ngag snying gi ti ka 'diH. yid ches bskyed phyir 'ga' la bstan kyang rungH. zhes pas khungs btsun yid ches bskyed pa lo rgyus gsang ba snying gi tika 'tsho rgyal mi brjed gzungs kyis btus te A car+ya ye shes kyis bka' shog la btab pa /
gnyis pa ma smin pa smin par byed pa dbang ni /
chos kyi sgo 'byed lus ngag yid gsum sminH. byin rlabs rtsa ba dbang gi rim pa gsumH. bsdus pa gtor dbang byin rlabs sprin phung dangH. 'bring po don dpang nor bu'i lugs su bskurH. rgyas pa dregs pa'i srog tig dmar nag laH. gsang dbang bde chen 'khor lo rim pa gsumH. pha rol blo dang gang 'tsham bskur bar byaH. 'on kyang dbang bzhi yongs su rdzogs pa ruH. bskur ba'i las can 'ga' re ma gtogs paH. rang gi srog pas gces so zhib tu dpyodH. ces pa ltar chos sgo 'byed pa drag po thugs sgrub kyi gtor dbang byin rlabs kyi sprin phung ngam ting nge 'dzin gyi gtor dbang nor bu lugs su bskur ba /

mthar thug zab mo'i tshe sgrub skor dag laH. tshe sgrub gsang 'dus de yi bstod bskul dangH. tshe sgrub gsang 'dus yang zab sgrub pa dangH. phyi nang gsang gsum spra 'khrid rtags yig bcasH. 'chi med tshe yi bcud len mthar thug go /

las byang gi bu yig bstod pa bcom ldan tshe bdag ma dang /

rgya ma las /

gsang 'khrid bde chen lam rdzogs /
sgrub pa snying por byed pa'i bgegs g.yeng ba spang phyir de'i zhen pa gcod pa bdud rtsi mtshan gyi bcud len rgyu dus sbyor ba za thabs bzhis bstan pa zhar byung sbos khrag glo nang sel ba /
mig nang sel ba /
? gzhon sha rgyas pa /
lo brgya thub pa /
dug rags kyis mi tshugs pa /
mdze sel ba /
nad rims kyi mi tshugs pa /
mkha' 'gro 'du zhang lus yang stobs bkrag mdangs dang ldan pa rnams ston pa /
gter bdag rdo rje g.yu sgron ma'i sgrub thabs bla rdo rten rdzas bcad thabs gsol tshig steng phyogs dag 'phrul ma dang bcas pa /
pe har gyi gsol kha dgung sngon mthon po ma /
btsan gsol bod yul dbus rgyal ma /
klu gsol ne sing sngo mtha' ma ste gter bdag pa btsan klu gsum gyi gsol kha bskul dang bcas pa padma thod? 'phreng gis sbyar ba rdzogs so'i mtha' can /
kha byad las /
gter bdag mchod dang dpe chan bdunH. de yis 'khrid kyi rgyab skyor tshangH. zhes so /
kha byang las /
spyi ru bsgril pas chos tshan niH. lnga bcu rtsa gcig grangs su yodH. ces pa byung yang kha byang dang ngo 'phrod pa lnga bcu rtsa lnga byung bas yig skyon yin nam brtag /
kha byang las /
e ka dza Ti gza' dang rdor legs dangH. ro sreg skor gsum lung byang ma tshang ngoH. shog dril lnga bo zho stod brag la yodH. de rnams bton na chos 'di tshang ba'iH. zhes pa'i shog dril lnga mang rang gter ston 'jam dpal rdo rjes bton pa'i rgyun 'dug kyang brgyud bar gong ra ba nyi zla grags pa 'dug bas ma mnos /
chos kyi bskong gter 'byung yid bzhin nor bu'i 'phreng ba zhes pa nang so rgyal ba don grub kyis bskul nas gter ston gyis mdzad pa /
des mjag pa'i sngon 'gro chos spyod byin rlabs sprin phung snang ba ma 'god ma /
gsang dbang gi gsol 'debs zur du bkol ba snang stong dag ba ma /
o rgyan za hor ma la brten ba'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor yid bzhin nor bu gsol 'debs mkha' dbyings rnam dag ma dang bcas pa /
sprul sku sna tshogs rang grol rgyas gra dar rgyas chos gling du mdzad pa'i kun bzang dgongs pa kun 'dus kyi snying po don 'khrid gsal ba'i sgron me man ngag nyams len snying po bsdus pa mkha' 'gro'i gsang tshig ma rnams /
de yang mu tig 'phreng ba las /
de phyir 'cho rgyal khyod kyi yi ger thobH. mchims phu dge'u gong ka gdan 'og tu sbosH. rag gdong nag ma e ka dza Tir gtadH. padma gsal khyod skye ba mang brgyud nasH. phyi mjug gter ston skya ba snga phye gsumH. dri med ming can bum thang phyogs su skyeH. de dus gter 'di bton nas gsang zhing sbaH. skye ba phyi ma 'gro don dpag med 'byungH. zhes sprul sku chul rdor /
kun mkhyen glong chen pa /
padma gling pa dang gsum 'byung ba'i gong du mchan gyis gsal ba'i chos sde bcu po mchims phu dge bu'i gtsug lag khang gi ga gdan 'og nas kun mkhyen glong chen pas spyan drangs pa lung bstan bzhin ma spel bar bsangs te bum thang thar pa gling du yang gter du sbas pa gter ston padma gling pas ches sde yongs rdzogs su ma zad glong chen pa'i yang gar? rnams kyang spyan drangs te glegs bam gcig tu bzhugs pa dang bcas pa'i dbang lung yongs rdzogs thob pa'i brgyud pa ni /
chos sku kun tu bzang po yab yum /
longs sku rdo rje sems dpa' /
sprul sku dga' rab rdo rje /
o rgyan sangs rgyas gnyis pa /
jo mo @# / /
mkhar chen bza' 'tsho rgyal /
lha lcam padma gsal /
gter ston rigs 'dzin chen po padma gling pa /
de la sprul sku sna tshogs rang grol dang dbu mdzad grub pa kun 'dus gnyis kas gsan /
gnyis ka la pad gling sprul sku bstan 'dzin grags pas gsan /
da nas mkhas mchog mdo sngags bstan 'dzin /
de sras gnyos ston mkhas grub 'phrin las lhun grub /
de sras sprul sku /
mkhas grub chos rje rnam gnyis zlar /
gter ston 'gro 'dul gter bdag gling pa /
des bdag za hor ban+de la bka' drin du rtsal to / /
yang na bstan 'dzin grags pa nas /
gdung brgyud padma 'phrin las /
gsung sprul chul khrims rdo rje /
rje 'phrin las lhun grub man 'dra /
yang na dbu mdzad grub pa kun 'dus nas /
yongs 'dzin padma 'phrin las man 'dra /
tshe sgrub kyi lung brgyud lugs gcig ni /
gter ston nas /
mi 'gyur kun dga' dpal bzang /
'bri khung gnam lcags me 'bar /
rigs 'dzin bkra shis rgya mtsho /
mkhas grub du ma rang grol /
ngag dbang ye shes grub pa /
